author: Daily Mirror
title: Ground News - Oleksandr Usyk backed to beat "under-motivated" Tyson Fury in undisputed fight
text:
Summary by Daily Mirror Two months have gone by since Fury was pushed to the brink by Francis Ngannou and the Brit has been told he will lose against Usyk in their undisputed world title fight Share menu More
